creator: mayank.shah@gs.com
text:
Will the next milestone release of Tomcat support WebDav on NT 4.0?  Not all of 
us have the luxuary of upgrading to 2k at work and need the support on 4.0

creator: mayank.shah@gs.com
text: In addition, how about a newer verion of DAV Explorer?

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
We will try to address WebDAV compatibility based on individual reports. The 
compatibility list only includes clients I have personally tested. Others may 
or may not work.

Note: DAV Explorer 0.70 works fine.
